CustomField.description: As a current Alert Tracker user, I need to have the ability to enter multiple 10-digit number(s) in the Orig ANI field so that every case includes a 10-digit number Standard TN format, XXX XXX-XXXX
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter multiple 10-digit number(s) in the Orig ANI field so that every case includes a 10-digit number in Standard TN format, XXX XXX-XXXX
CustomField.label: Orig Ani
